page.title: 06THE PEOPLE OF MARKS TEY - 5
page.content: {82%}have a holiday in Britain and{37% go abroad , some have holidays abroad and in Britain. {92%}are home owners ,{47%}have{4} bedrooms and{6%}even have{5}bedrooms. (A.Hall) {SHOPS & FACILITIES Most of the shops in Marks Tey are about a quarter of a mile from the estate and across the busy{A12}road. There is a butchers, a bakers, a post office, a radio'TV shop, two motor garages and a general store. On the estate is a little shop which sells sweets, food, meat, toys and greetings cards which is handy for last minute things like birthday presents. About{10 minutes}away from the estate is a farm shop which sells eggs, salad food and pet food,it also has a cafeteria for travellers. Only {2%}of
